channel.title: Ask for help
channel.description:
Hi, I need help whit a 317 client
I need help to get by yell when the owner speaks [Game Owner] Dragonkil and of admin [Admin] and mod [Moderator] in a blue colour
Thnks

item.title: Ask for help
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Are you asking how to add colours to yell?

If you are then this is client sided and you need to post this topic in the Client Help section, Not in the Server Help section.

Read full topic
